message: What's your favorite Haskell web framework and why?

Happstack is my personal favorite for a number of reasons, one of which is the responsiveness of Jeremy Shaw, the lead developer. I'm also just fond of the general interaction, though I haven't given too much of a look into Yesod to draw better comparisons.
Oh, and version 6 was just released: http://groups.google.com/group/happs/browse_thread/thread/f72d7ff313ea9fa0
